author: missirol
body:
Patch resulted from the debugging done in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33945 (mostly carried out by others before me).

Aims to solve failure of some unit tests in ASAN IBs of CMSSW (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33945 for further details).

Opening this PR to test the patch, as suggested by @smuzaffar.
title: patch for function arg/return types in `frontier_client.py`
